Name: Establishment of the office of nightlife.
Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to the establishment of the office of nightlife

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Small Business
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee

Attachments.Name: Minutes of the Stated Meeting - June 8, 2023

Summary: This bill would amend the New York City Charter to authorize the Mayor to establish the Office of Nightlife within the Department of Small Business Services.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
       
      Section 1. Subdivision b of section 20-d of the New York city charter, as added by local law number 178 for the year 2017, is amended to read as follows:
      b. The mayor shall establish an office of nightlife.  Such office may be established within any office of the mayor or as a separate office or within any agency that does not conduct enforcement against nightlife establishments, provided that such office may also be established within the department of small business services.  Such office shall be headed by a director who shall be appointed by the mayor or by the head of such office or agency. 
      ï¿½ 2. This local law takes effect immediately.
